text: This document outlines the procedures we intend to use in testing the parasites.
The first and most critical step is selecting test subjects to be infected.
Under normal circumstances, we would use animals. However, we cannot risk compromising our food supply.
Therefore, human testing will begin immediately.
Specifically, subjects will be chosen from the lower floors.
They are expendable, and their numbers are sufficient that no one will notice a few missing.
While we determine the best way to transport these individuals here, construction has begun on a machine designed for forced injection of the parasite into the subjects.
Its size may pose a logistical challenge for this laboratory.
